overview: Maya Bijou postpones a weekend getaway with her primary boyfriend, Tyler Nixon so she can spend some time with her other boyfriend Charles who has been away. Tyler and Emily Willis travel up the coast to enjoy the weekend all by themselves. While his girlfriend Emily, is off with Tyler, Seth Gamble spends some time with a new girl Sadie Black who he's just met and is very curious about the whole concept of a polyamory relationship. She has fantasies about joining in, but wants to test the waters before fully committing. When Maya bails on an evening out with Mick Blue and Autumn Falls the two find solace in each other with a full evening of full romance and scorching hot sex!
title: Polyamory 4
